name: cloudflare
label: Cloudflare
description: Cloudflare helps to automatically scan the entire public internet,  including DDoS protection, web application firewall, bot management, encryption, DNS security, access control, and rate limiting, to safeguard websites and online applications from various cyber threats.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the cloudflare WAF server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the cloudflare WAF server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Account ID
fields.description: Specify the Account ID to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the Account ID to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: account_id

fields.title: Zone ID
fields.description: Specify the Zone ID to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the Zone ID to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: zone_id

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the Global API Key to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the Global API Key to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: api_key

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Create Firewall Rule
operations.description: Allows users to add or create a new firewall rule in a firewall configuration

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify a description or name for the new firewall rule being created
parameters.tooltip: Specify a description or name for the new firewall rule being created

parameters.title: Action
parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Specify the action or behavior to be taken when the rule's conditions are met
parameters.tooltip: Specify the action or behavior to be taken when the rule's conditions are met

parameters.title: Products
parameters.name: products
parameters.description: Select one or more products or services to which the firewall rule applies
parameters.tooltip: Select one or more products or services to which the firewall rule applies

parameters.title: Paused
parameters.name: paused
parameters.description: Specify whether the newly created firewall rule should be initially paused or inactive
parameters.tooltip: Specify whether the newly created firewall rule should be initially paused or inactive

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Specify the precedence or order of the newly created firewall rule relative to other rules
parameters.tooltip: Specify the precedence or order of the newly created firewall rule relative to other rules

parameters.title: Reference Tag
parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: Specify an association of a reference or identifier with the newly created firewall rule
parameters.tooltip: Specify an association of a reference or identifier with the newly created firewall rule

parameters.title: Filter ID
parameters.name: filter_id
parameters.description: Specify the identifier of an existing filter to be associated with the newly created firewall rule. Required if filter_expression is unspecified.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the identifier of an existing filter to be associated with the newly created firewall rule. Required if filter_expression is unspecified.

parameters.title: Filter Expression
parameters.name: filter_expression
parameters.description: Specify the identifier of an existing filter to be associated with the newly created firewall rule. Required if filter_expression is unspecified. more info: https://developers.cloudflare.com/ruleset-engine/rules-language/expressions/'
parameters.tooltip: Specify the identifier of an existing filter to be associated with the newly created firewall rule. Required if filter_expression is unspecified. more info: https://developers.cloudflare.com/ruleset-engine/rules-language/expressions/

operations.title: Update Firewall Rule
operations.description: Allows users to modify or edit an existing firewall rule within the firewall configuration

parameters.title: Rule ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the unique identifier of the firewall rule that needs to be updated.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unique identifier of the firewall rule that needs to be updated.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify the description or name of the existing firewall rule to modify or update
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description or name of the existing firewall rule to modify or update

parameters.title: Action
parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Specify the action or behavior to be taken when the updated rule's conditions are met
parameters.tooltip: Specify the action or behavior to be taken when the updated rule's conditions are met

parameters.title: Products
parameters.name: products
parameters.description: Select one or more products or services to which the updated firewall rule applies
parameters.tooltip: Select one or more products or services to which the updated firewall rule applies

parameters.title: Paused
parameters.name: paused
parameters.description: To update a firewall rule, it can be set to either active or inactive. To choose this option, the firewall rule must be paused or inactive
parameters.tooltip: To update a firewall rule, it can be set to either active or inactive. To choose this option, the firewall rule must be paused or inactive

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Specify the precedence or order of the firewall rules to be updated
parameters.tooltip: Specify the precedence or order of the firewall rules to be updated

parameters.title: Reference Tag
parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: Specify a reference or identifier for the firewall rule to be updated
parameters.tooltip: Specify a reference or identifier for the firewall rule to be updated

parameters.title: Filter ID
parameters.name: filter_id
parameters.description: Specifies the identifier of an existing filter to be associated with the updated firewall rule. Can not update or delete rule filter, only add a new filter
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the identifier of an existing filter to be associated with the updated firewall rule. Can not update or delete rule filter, only add a new filter.

operations.title: List Firewall Rules
operations.description: Get a list of firewall rules that are currently configured for your Cloudflare account or for a specific domain or zone within your account

parameters.title: Action
parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Specifies the action or operation to be performed when retrieving firewall rules. Must be an exact match
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the action or operation to be performed when retrieving firewall rules. Must be an exact match

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify this parameter allows you to filter firewall rules based on their description or name
parameters.tooltip: Specify this parameter allows you to filter firewall rules based on their description or name

parameters.title: Rule ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the unique identifier of the firewall rule
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unique identifier of the firewall rule

parameters.title: Paused
parameters.name: paused
parameters.description: Specify this parameter value true, indicates that the firewall rule is currently paused
parameters.tooltip: Specify this parameter value true, indicates that the firewall rule is currently paused

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page number of paginated results
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number of paginated results

parameters.title: Record Per Page
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Specify this parameter to indicate the number of firewall rules per page
parameters.tooltip: Specify this parameter to indicate the number of firewall rules per page

operations.title: Delete Firewall Rule
operations.description: Remove or delete an existing firewall rule from the firewall configuration

parameters.title: Rule ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the unique identifier of the firewall rule to delete
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unique identifier of the firewall rule to delete

operations.title: Create Filter
operations.description: Allows users to add a new filter to their WAF configuration

parameters.title: Zone ID
parameters.name: zone_id
parameters.description: Specifies the unique identifier of the Cloudflare zone where the filter will be applied
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the unique identifier of the Cloudflare zone where the filter will be applied

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Allows users to provide a description or additional information about the newly created filter
parameters.tooltip: Allows users to provide a description or additional information about the newly created filter

parameters.title: Expression
parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: Specify this parameter allows users to define the filtering criteria or rules for the newly created filter
parameters.tooltip: Specify this parameter allows users to define the filtering criteria or rules for the newly created filter

parameters.title: Reference ID
parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter allows users to associate a reference or identifier with the newly created filter
parameters.tooltip: Specifying this parameter allows users to associate a reference or identifier with the newly created filter.

parameters.title: Paused
parameters.name: paused
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter allows users to specify whether the newly created filter should be initially paused or active
parameters.tooltip: Specifying this parameter allows users to specify whether the newly created filter should be initially paused or active

operations.title: List Filters
operations.description: Retrieve a list of filters configured within the Cloudflare Web Application Firewall (WAF) settings

parameters.title: Filter ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the identifier of a specific filter for retrieval.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the identifier of a specific filter for retrieval.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Allows users to filter the list of filters based on their descriptions
parameters.tooltip: Allows users to filter the list of filters based on their descriptions

parameters.title: Expression
parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: Specify a search expression or pattern to filter the list of filters returned by the Cloudflare WAF
parameters.tooltip: Specify a search expression or pattern to filter the list of filters returned by the Cloudflare WAF

parameters.title: Reference ID
parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter allows users to filter the list of filters based on their reference or identifier.
parameters.tooltip: Specifying this parameter allows users to filter the list of filters based on their reference or identifier.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page number of paginated results
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number of paginated results

parameters.title: Per Page
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Specify this parameter to indicate the number of filters per page
parameters.tooltip: Specify this parameter to indicate the number of filters per page

operations.title: Update Filter
operations.description: Modify and update the configuration settings of existing filters within their WAF configuration

parameters.title: Filter ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specifies the unique identifier of the filter that the user intends to update
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the unique identifier of the filter that the user intends to update

parameters.title: Zone ID
parameters.name: zone_id
parameters.description: Specifies this parameter facilitates the modification of the Cloudflare zone to which a specific filter is associated
parameters.tooltip: Specifies this parameter facilitates the modification of the Cloudflare zone to which a specific filter is associated

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter allows users to update the description or additional information associated with a specific filter
parameters.tooltip: Specifying this parameter allows users to update the description or additional information associated with a specific filter

parameters.title: Expression
parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter allows users to modify the filtering criteria or rules associated with a specific filter
parameters.tooltip: Specifying this parameter allows users to modify the filtering criteria or rules associated with a specific filter

parameters.title: Reference ID
parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter allows users to modify or update the reference or identifier associated with a specific filter
parameters.tooltip: Specifying this parameter allows users to modify or update the reference or identifier associated with a specific filter

parameters.title: Paused
parameters.name: paused
parameters.description: Provides users with the ability to control the activation status of a specific filter
parameters.tooltip: Provides users with the ability to control the activation status of a specific filter

operations.title: Delete Filter
operations.description: Allows users to remove a specific filter from their WAF configuration.

parameters.title: Filter ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specifies the unique identifier of the filter that users want to remove from their WAF configuration
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the unique identifier of the filter that users want to remove from their WAF configuration

operations.title: List Zones
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all zones associated with the user's Cloudflare account

parameters.title: Match
parameters.name: match
parameters.description: Specifies this parameter is used to filter the list of zones based on specific criteria
parameters.tooltip: Specifies this parameter is used to filter the list of zones based on specific criteria

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter allows users to filter the list of zones based on the zone name
parameters.tooltip: Specifying this parameter allows users to filter the list of zones based on the zone name

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter allows users to filter the list of zones based on the name of the Cloudflare account associated with each zone
parameters.tooltip: Specifying this parameter allows users to filter the list of zones based on the name of the Cloudflare account associated with each zone

parameters.title: Order
parameters.name: order
parameters.description:
Specifying this parameter allows users to specify the order in which the list of zones should be sorted in the response. Possible values :
name
status
account.id
account.name
parameters.tooltip:
Specifying this parameter allows users to specify the order in which the list of zones should be sorted in the response. Possible values :
name
status
account.id
account.name

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter allows users to filter the list of zones based on their current operational status
parameters.tooltip: Specifying this parameter allows users to filter the list of zones based on their current operational status

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter allows users to specify the sorting direction of the list of zones based on certain criteria
parameters.tooltip: Specifying this parameter allows users to specify the sorting direction of the list of zones based on certain criteria

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page number of paginated results
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number of paginated results

parameters.title: Per Page
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Specify this parameter to indicate the number of zones per page
parameters.tooltip: Specify this parameter to indicate the number of zones per page

operations.title: Get IP Lists
operations.description: Allows users to retrieve information about IP lists configured within their Cloudflare account

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page number of paginated results
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number of paginated results

parameters.title: Per Page
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Specify this parameter to indicate the number of IP list items per page
parameters.tooltip: Specify this parameter to indicate the number of IP list items per page

operations.title: Create IP List
operations.description: Create a new IP list with a specified name and associated IP addresses.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specifies the name of the new IP list to be created
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the name of the new IP list to be created

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify this parameter to allows users to provide additional information or details about the new IP list being created
parameters.tooltip: Specify this parameter to allows users to provide additional information or details about the new IP list being created

operations.title: Delete IP List
operations.description: Remove an existing IP list from their Cloudflare account

parameters.title: List ID
parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the list that you want to delete
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the ID of the list that you want to delete

operations.title: Create IP Items List
operations.description: Add or append new items, such as IP addresses, to a specific list

parameters.title: List ID
parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the list from which you want to add or append as new items to the list.
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the ID of the list from which you want to add or append as new items to the list.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: ip_address
parameters.description: Specifies a CSV list of IP addresses that you want to add or append as new items to the list.
parameters.tooltip: Specifies a CSV list of IP addresses that you want to add or append as new items to the list.

operations.title: Get IP List Items
operations.description: Retrieves the list of IP addresses items from a specific list

parameters.title: List ID
parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the list from which you want to retrieve the list of IP addresses.
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the ID of the list from which you want to retrieve the list of IP addresses.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page number of paginated results
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number of paginated results

parameters.title: Record Per Page
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Specify this parameter to indicate the number of IP list item per page
parameters.tooltip: Specify this parameter to indicate the number of IP list item per page

operations.title: Update IP List Items
operations.description: Removes all existing items from the list and adds the provided items to the list.

parameters.title: List ID
parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the list from which you want to update the list of IP addresses.
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the ID of the list from which you want to update the list of IP addresses.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: ip_address
parameters.description: Specifies a CSV list of IP addresses that you want to update within the item list
parameters.tooltip: Specifies a CSV list of IP addresses that you want to update within the item list

operations.title: Delete IP List Items
operations.description: Allows users to remove specific items, such as IP addresses, from an IP list

parameters.title: List ID
parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the list from which you want to delete the IP list
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the ID of the list from which you want to delete the IP list

parameters.title: Item ID
parameters.name: items_id
parameters.description: Specifies a CSV list of items ID that you want to delete from the list.
parameters.tooltip: Specifies a CSV list of items ID that you want to delete from the list.
